name: CategoryTheory.Adjunction.gc
initialProofState:
X : Type u
Y : Type v
inst✝¹ : Preorder X
inst✝ : Preorder Y
L : CategoryTheory.Functor X Y
R : CategoryTheory.Functor Y X
adj : CategoryTheory.Adjunction L R
⊢ GaloisConnection L.obj R.obj
decl:
/-- An adjunction between preorder categories induces a galois connection.
-/
theorem Adjunction.gc {L : X ⥤ Y} {R : Y ⥤ X} (adj : L ⊣ R) : GaloisConnection L.obj R.obj :=
  fun x y =>
  ⟨fun h => ((adj.homEquiv x y).toFun h.hom).le, fun h => ((adj.homEquiv x y).invFun h.hom).le⟩
